content: You should probably invest in a Virtual Private Network, or VPN . You are probably getting pretty tired of hearing that, and we're definitely getting tired of reminding everyone.  If you haven't yet jumped on board the VPN train, then now is the perfect opportunity. CyberGhost VPN has dropped the price of its three-year deal by a massive 80%. This works out at just £2.09 a month , billed in one lump sum every three years. This deal also comes with a generous 45-day money-back guarantee, so you're covered if things don't work out. There's a good reason we bang on about VPNs, and it's because they are effective at keeping you safe online. It's as simple as that. CyberGhost VPN is one of the best at doing this job, and has a number of clever features to protect you. CyberGhost VPN has over 3,500 servers worldwide, allows you to connect to seven devices at the same time, and provides 24/7 live support. And you can have all that for just over £2 a month. The clock is ticking on this saving, and we won't say that again. Image: CyberGhost VPN CyberGhost VPN — £2.09 a month for three years See Details

Pay just over £2 a month for CyberGhost VPN with this incredible deal

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Joseph GreenMashable Deals2019-02-28 11:35:10 UTC

You should probably invest in a Virtual Private Network, or VPN. You are probably getting pretty tired of hearing that, and we're definitely getting tired of reminding everyone. 

If you haven't yet jumped on board the VPN train, then now is the perfect opportunity. CyberGhost VPN has dropped the price of its three-year deal by a massive 80%. This works out at just £2.09 a month, billed in one lump sum every three years. This deal also comes with a generous 45-day money-back guarantee, so you're covered if things don't work out.

There's a good reason we bang on about VPNs, and it's because they are effective at keeping you safe online. It's as simple as that. CyberGhost VPN is one of the best at doing this job, and has a number of clever features to protect you.

CyberGhost VPN has over 3,500 servers worldwide, allows you to connect to seven devices at the same time, and provides 24/7 live support. And you can have all that for just over £2 a month.

The clock is ticking on this saving, and we won't say that again.




CyberGhost VPN — £2.09 a month for three years
See Details

Topics: cyberghost, data privacy, data protection, Mashable Deals, shopping-uk, Tech, uk-deals
